definition.name: Setup Java JDK
definition.description: Set up a specific version of the Java JDK and add the command-line tools to the PATH
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: java-version
inputs.description: The Java version to set up. Takes a whole or semver Java version. See examples of supported syntax in README file

inputs.name: java-version-file
inputs.description: The path to the `.java-version` file. See examples of supported syntax in README file

inputs.name: distribution
inputs.description: Java distribution. See the list of supported distributions in README file

inputs.name: java-package
inputs.description: The package type (jdk, jre, jdk+fx, jre+fx)

inputs.name: architecture
inputs.description: The architecture of the package (defaults to the action runner's architecture)

inputs.name: jdkFile
inputs.description: Path to where the compressed JDK is located

inputs.name: check-latest
inputs.description: Set this option if you want the action to check for the latest available version that satisfies the version spec

inputs.name: server-id
inputs.description: ID of the distributionManagement repository in the pom.xml file. Default is `github`

inputs.name: server-username
inputs.description: Environment variable name for the username for authentication to the Apache Maven repository. Default is $GITHUB_ACTOR

inputs.name: server-password
inputs.description: Environment variable name for password or token for authentication to the Apache Maven repository. Default is $GITHUB_TOKEN

inputs.name: settings-path
inputs.description: Path to where the settings.xml file will be written. Default is ~/.m2.

inputs.name: overwrite-settings
inputs.description: Overwrite the settings.xml file if it exists. Default is "true".

inputs.name: gpg-private-key
inputs.description: GPG private key to import. Default is empty string.

inputs.name: gpg-passphrase
inputs.description: Environment variable name for the GPG private key passphrase. Default is $GPG_PASSPHRASE.

inputs.name: cache
inputs.description: Name of the build platform to cache dependencies. It can be "maven", "gradle" or "sbt".

inputs.name: job-status
inputs.description: Workaround to pass job status to post job step. This variable is not intended for manual setting

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: The token used to authenticate when fetching version manifests hosted on github.com, such as for the Microsoft Build of OpenJDK. When running this action on github.com, the default value is sufficient. When running on GHES, you can pass a personal access token for github.com if you are experiencing rate limiting.

inputs.name: mvn-toolchain-id
inputs.description: Name of Maven Toolchain ID if the default name of "${distribution}_${java-version}" is not wanted. See examples of supported syntax in Advanced Usage file

inputs.name: mvn-toolchain-vendor
inputs.description: Name of Maven Toolchain Vendor if the default name of "${distribution}" is not wanted. See examples of supported syntax in Advanced Usage file

outputs.name: distribution
outputs.description: Distribution of Java that has been installed

outputs.name: version
outputs.description: Actual version of the java environment that has been installed

outputs.name: path
outputs.description: Path to where the java environment has been installed (same as $JAVA_HOME)

outputs.name: cache-hit
outputs.description: A boolean value to indicate an exact match was found for the primary key
